title: Viral Quote About Jawaharlal Nehru Attributed To Priyanka Chaturvedi Is Fake
subtitle: BOOM did not find any such tweet and contacted Chaturvedi who confirmed it is fake and she has made no such statement,
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Congress Spokesperson Priyanka Chaturvedi said, "If Pakistan did not exist, then we would not require such a large number of soldiers and people would not get jobs in the defense sector. Nehru made Pakistan and brought employment."

This WhatsApp message of a screenshot of a tweet quoting Congress Spokesperson Priyanka Chaturvedi is fake. BOOM did not find any such tweet and contacted Chaturvedi who confirmed it is fake and she has made no such statement
